title:
Flu Fighting Miso Soup
Tastemade
December 7, 2015
directions: Bring 4 cups of water to a simmer over medium heat. Add the swiss chard, stir and simmer for 3 minutes.
Pour in the tofu, green onion and miso. Stir and simmer for 5 minutes.
Place in the seaweed and stir. Serve immediately and fell better!
ingredients: 1 sheet of dried seaweed (Nori) cut into small rectangles
